predicate.note: Frames file for 'solidify' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to make solid, strong, or united

example.name: transitive
example.text: The additions solidify American 's position as the third-largest U.S. transatlantic carrier , behind PanAm Corp. 's Pan American World Airways and Trans World Airlines .
example.arg: American 's position as the third-largest U.S. transatlantic carrier , behind PanAm Corp. 's Pan American World Airways and Trans World Airlines

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Now , however , as the court 's new five-member conservative majority continues [*-1] to solidify , victories for the liberals are rare .
example.arg: [*-1] -> the court 's new five-member conservative majority
